attributes.description:
This beautiful SUV is arriving soon, its only got 57000km on the clock and balance of its 5 year/100000km maintenance plan expiring at 2023/07/23 or 100000km, it is equipped with Towing equip/trailer adj. stability, front electric seats adjustment, roof rails finished in black & LED headlights. Please note that this price doesn't include on the road costs, transportation can be arranged at a nominal fee. We offer excellent in house finance offers. 


All our vehicles have passed our stringent 160-point check
Our vehicles have a full-service history
None of our vehicles have been registered for more than 5 years old
Our vehicles have a maximum mileage of 120 000km
We get our cars’ mileage readings verified
Our vehicles come with the balance of Manufacturer’s Warranty - or a new warranty
The Balance of the Service Plan and Maintenance Plan is included
We offer Roadside Assistance for 12 months
We accept all trade-ins
We offer test drives on all our used vehicles

attributes.description: Motus Ford Kroonstad offers nationwide delivery to all of our valued customers as well as our very own Finance and Insurance Manager who is ready to help with finance at our dealership or over the phone for your CONVENIENCE in a matter of MINUTES with all 4 major banks. All of our vehicles come with a 160-point QUALITY Check meaning they check every part of the vehicle to make sure it is 101% Roadworthy as well as 101% PERFECT just for you! Please note that the price advertised excludes our Documentation, License and Delivery fees all at one standard price. Test Drives and Trade Ins are most certainly welcome.

We have a full range pre-owned Ford and other popular brands of used vehicles. We would like to give you the best deal on a used car or low mileage demo vehicle.
